title: linkaGoGO
description: This document describes the REST API for linkaGoGo. With this API, third-party applications can query and modify linkaGoGo bookmarks and folders.The API is based on the principles of REST. The API uses a small set of HTTP operations for its functionality. The operations are GET (retrieve), POST(create), PUT(update) and DELETE(delete). These operations can be applied on Folders and Bookmarks.
